name: Visualizer (itch)
description:
Visualizer is a first-person rhythm shooter developed by Champlain College Seniors. It features:

  1. Unique rhythm based gameplay and mechanics
  2. A five level campaign mode with a final boss at the end
  3. Five unique weapons with unlockable upgrades
  4. An endless horde-survival mode 
  5. An all original soundtrack 

This is a beta build of Visualizer and will be updated to a full released version in 2 to 3 weeks.

Thank you for all of your support. If you would like to contact us please email us at littlelizardstudios@gmail.com or you can contact us via Twitter or Facebook.
